venue.name: Westford Regency Inn and Conference Center

item.description:
*** CARPOOL LEAVES CAMBRIDGE AT 5:30PM. READ THROUGH THE END TO FIND OUT CARPOOLING OPTIONS.

Hello Meetup Fam!! We're going on our first ROAD TRIP!!

Next month we are going to try something special! We are going to take Meetup on the road to the Nueva Vida Fiesta at Westford Regency Inn and Conference Center. There will be performances by special guests Adrian & Amanda from DC, Salsa Beginner Bootcamps, Rumba & Afro Cuban workshops, dance shoes on sale and lots of Boston/New Hampshire salseros and salseras to dance with! This event is set up to build community between Boston and New Hampshire salseros, so join us!

Register Online at: http://salsanewhampshire.com/fiesta.html

SCHEDULE

7:00-8:00pm Guaguanco Workshop with Adrian & Amanda, ALL LEVELS

8:00-9:00pm Afro Cuban Workshops with Adrian & Amanda, ALL LEVELS

7:00-9:00pm  Salsa Beginner Mini-Bootcamp with Aaron & Maylena of Masacote

9:00pm-1am  Dance Floor open for Dancing; Music by DJ Rob Suave from Boston
Dance to Salsa, Bachata, Cha Cha all night long!

10:00pm Showtime! Performances by...Adrian & Amanda and more.

Prices & Registration

Workshops -- $15 each, or BOTH for $20!!
Salsa Beginner Mini-Bootcamp -- $20

Party -- $15 in Advance;  $20 at the Door

REGISTER ONLINE AT: http://salsanewhampshire.com/fiesta.html

CARPOOLING

Westford is about a 40-45 minute drive from Boston. We are setting up a carpool meeting spot in Kendall Square, at the Kendall Marriott Hotel, Two Cambridge Center, 50 Broadway · Cambridge, MA. This is going to require a little pre-planning. We will do our best to accomodate everyone that replies. However, this is our first attempt at this type of meetup so bear with us on this one.

PLEASE post and or email us below if:

1. You have a car and can meetup and DRIVE to Westford. WE COULD USE SOME HELP! Don't forget to post how many extra spots you have in your car.

OR

2. You are looking for a spot in a car.

Current Drivers and spots are listed below...

Lonzell - 3 spots available

If you plan on driving to Westford yourself the address is 219 Littleton Rd Westford, MA 01886.

We will have a reserved table just inside the door. Look for us there!
item.how_to_find_us: *** We are Carpooling from Boston to WESTFORD! Meet at 5:30pm in the lobby of the Kendall Marriott Hotel, Two Cambridge Center, 50 Broadway · Cambridge, MA. If you'd rather meet us at the venue in Westford, we'll have the table nearest to the door.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Nueva Vida Fiesta ROAD TRIP to Westford, MA; The Cuban Edition with Masacote!!
